qas.question: What magazine listed Comcast as one of its top places to work?
What is Comcast's affiliated entity in Philadelphia?
What newspaper named Comcast it's top place to work?
In what year did this newspaper confer this honor on Comcast?
On what aspect did Black Enterprise Magazine name Comcast a top 15 employer?
What magazine was determined as one of the best places to work in 2009?
What newspaper was deemed the best place to work?
The Washington Post mentioned the Comcast organization in which city?

context: Despite these criticisms, Comcast has appeared on multiple "top places to work" lists. In 2009, it was included on <a0_0><b5_0>CableFAX<b5_0/><a0_0/> magazine's "Top 10 Places to Work in Cable", which cited its "<b8_0>scale, savvy and vision<b8_0/>". Similarly, the Philadelphia Business Journal awarded Comcast the silver medal among extra-large companies in <b9_0>Philadelphia<b9_0/>, with the gold medal going to partner organization, <a1_0>Comcast-Spectacor<a1_0/>. <a2_0><b7_0>The Boston Globe<b7_0/><a2_0/> found Comcast to be that city's top place to work in <a3_0>2009<a3_0/>. Employee diversity is also an attribute upon which <b6_0>Comcast<b6_0/> receives strong marks. In 2008, Black Enterprise magazine rated Comcast among the top 15 companies for <a4_0>workforce diversity<a4_0/>. Comcast was also named a "Top 2014 Workplace" by the Washington Post in their annual feature.
